00047 Vector3D::Vector3D( double dx, double dy, double dz )
00048 : x(dx), y(dy), z(dz)
00049 {
00050 }
00051 
00052 Vector3D::Vector3D( const NormalVector& norm )
00053 : x(norm.x), y(norm.y), z(norm.z)
00054 {
00055 }
00056 
00057 Vector3D::Vector3D( const Point3D& point )
00058 : x(point.x), y(point.y), z(point.z)
00059 {
00060 }

00062 Vector3D::~Vector3D( )
00063 {
00064 }

00066 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator+=( const Vector3D& vector )
00067 {
00068     x += vector.x;
00069     y += vector.y;
00070     z += vector.z;
00071     return *this;
00072 }
00073 
00074 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator-=( const Vector3D& vector )
00075 {
00076     x -= vector.x;
00077     y -= vector.y;
00078     z -= vector.z;
00079     return *this;
00080 }
00081 
00082 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator*=( double scalar )
00083 {
00084     x *= scalar;
00085     y *= scalar;
00086     z *= scalar;
00087     return *this;
00088 }
00089 
00090 Vector3D Vector3D::operator*( double scalar ) const
00091 {
00092     return Vector3D( x * scalar, y * scalar, z * scalar );
00093 }
00094 
00095 Vector3D& Vector3D::operator/=( double scalar )
00096 {
00097     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00098     x *= inv;
00099     y *= inv;
00100     z *= inv;
00101     return *this;
00102 }
00103 
00104 Vector3D Vector3D::operator/( double scalar ) const
00105 {
00106     double inv = 1.0/scalar;
00107     return Vector3D( x * inv, y * inv, z * inv );
00108 }
00109 
00110 Vector3D Vector3D::operator-() const
00111 {
00112     return Vector3D( -x, -y, -z );
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool Vector3D::operator==( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00116 {
00117         if( this == &vector ) return true;
00118     else return( ( fabs(x - vector.x) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00119                                  ( fabs(y - vector.y) < DBL_EPSILON ) &&
00120                                  ( fabs(z - vector.z) < DBL_EPSILON ) );
00121 }
00122 
00123 bool Vector3D::operator!=( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00124 {
00125         return !( *this == vector );
00126 }
00127 
00128 double Vector3D::operator[]( int i ) const
00129 {
00130     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00131     if( i == 1 ) return y;
00132     if( i == 2 ) return z;
00133 }
00134 
00135 double& Vector3D::operator[]( int i )
00136 {
00137     if( i == 0 ) return x;
00138     if( i == 1 ) return y;
00139     if( i == 2 ) return z;
00140 }
00141 
00142 void Vector3D::zero()
00143 {
00144     x = 0.0;
00145     y = 0.0;
00146     z = 0.0;
00147 }
00148 
00149 double Vector3D::lengthSquared( ) const
00150 {
00151     return( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00152 }
00153 
00154 double Vector3D::length( ) const
00155 {
00156         return std::sqrt( x*x + y*y + z*z );
00157 }

00159 Vector3D operator+( Vector3D lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00160 {
00161         //lhs take by value to let the compile to make the copy
00162         return lhs += rhs;
00163 }
00164 
00165 Vector3D operator-( Vector3D lhs, const Vector3D& rhs )
00166 {
00167         //lhs take by value to let the compile to make the copy
00168         return lhs -= rhs;
00169 }
00170 
00171 Vector3D operator*( double scalar, const Vector3D& vector )
00172 {
00173     return Vector3D( scalar * vector.x, scalar * vector.y, scalar * vector.z );
00174 }
00175 
00176 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Vector3D& vector )
00177 {
00178     os << vector.x << ", " << vector.y << ", " << vector.z;
00179     return os;
00180 }

00182 double DotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00183 {
00184     return vA.x*vB.x + vA.y*vB.y + vA.z*vB.z;
00185 }
00186 
00187 double DotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const NormalVector& nB )
00188 {
00189     return vA.x*nB.x + vA.y*nB.y + vA.z*nB.z;
00190 }
00191 
00192 double DotProduct( const NormalVector& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00193 {
00194     return nA.x*vB.x + nA.y*vB.y + nA.z*vB.z;
00195 }
00196 
00197 double AbsDotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00198 {
00199     return fabs( DotProduct( vA, vB ) );
00200 }
00201 
00202 double AbsDotProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const NormalVector& nB )
00203 {
00204     return fabs( DotProduct( vA, nB ) );
00205 }
00206 
00207 double AbsDotProduct( const NormalVector& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00208 {
00209     return fabs( DotProduct( nA, vB ) );
00210 }
00211 
00212 Vector3D CrossProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00213 {
00214     return Vector3D( ( vA.y*vB.z ) - ( vA.z*vB.y ),
00215                      ( vA.z*vB.x ) - ( vA.x*vB.z ),
00216                      ( vA.x*vB.y ) - ( vA.y*vB.x ) );
00217 }
00218 
00219 Vector3D CrossProduct( const Vector3D& vA, const NormalVector& nB )
00220 {
00221     return Vector3D( ( vA.y*nB.z ) - ( vA.z*nB.y ),
00222                      ( vA.z*nB.x ) - ( vA.x*nB.z ),
00223                      ( vA.x*nB.y ) - ( vA.y*nB.x ) );
00224 }
00225 
00226 Vector3D CrossProduct( const NormalVector& nA, const Vector3D& vB )
00227 {
00228     return Vector3D( ( nA.y*vB.z ) - ( nA.z*vB.y ),
00229                      ( nA.z*vB.x ) - ( nA.x*vB.z ),
00230                      ( nA.x*vB.y ) - ( nA.y*vB.x ) );
00231 }
00232 
00233 Vector3D Normalize( const Vector3D& vA )
00234 {
00235     return vA / vA.length();
00236 }
00237 
00238 bool SameHemisphere( const Vector3D& vA, const Vector3D& vB )
00239 {
00240         return ( vA.z * vB.z > 0.0 );
00241 }
